00082     int32_t reopen_fd() {
00083       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00084       if (m_fd != -1)
00085         m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00086       m_fd = m_filesys->open(m_filename);
00087       return m_fd;
00088     }
